content: a basic granny stitch combines with self-striping yarn to create a big cozy crochet wrap stitched using 2 colors of caron macchiato cakes this pattern is perfect for flexing your skills in single_crochet double_crochet chains and slip_stitch techniques finished with an easy fringe you ll love keeping cozy wearing this wonderful layer no sizing makes this a great gift for anyone on your list materials caron® macchiato cakes™ 8 oz/227 g 481 yds/440 m contrast a solitude 71003 2 cakes or 880 yds/800 m contrast b breathe 71012 2 cakes or 880 yds/800 m measurements approx 30 x 76 76 x 196 cm excluding fringe
